channel.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
channel.description:
Well im new to MITB and Frell told me i had to post my 3ds scenes here instead of at MPSC. Im just telling you all that i am very very new to 3ds. This is like my 7th actual model from 3ds, so take it easy with the flaming if possible
I made a rough model of a Beretta 51 handgun [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/14aar5s.jpg[/img]
CC?

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

that is WAY too round imo. id say remake it. build it in parts i.e my p226 was built like a real one (discluding internals) hammer was 1 part, the base of the gun was another, the slide another, the barrel, etc. it gives it a more realistic look when you break it up like the real thing

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Oh okay thanks for clearing that up

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

No, it’s the way you’ve built the model that’s making the meshsmooth do that.

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Nah its just the MeshSmooth messing up the viewport textures i believe. Im no expert either as you can see lol

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Frell:

It looks like your smoothing a traced polygon that you extruded :s

Lol, all i know how to do. Im going to read a tutorial and make it better now

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:3, topic:292059”][quote author=cooper link=topic=385896.msg2893180#msg2893180 date=1249028897]
Looks pretty good, but going off of it’s a little bit too smooth looking, particularly the bottom of the grip. Also, the trigger appears to be a little bit different on your model.
[/quote]

Theres different versions of the baretta. And as some people model, they will get the general shape of an object and then start adding the detail and what not.[/quote]
Well, he specified the “51” version, the trigger he has matches the 92 model more.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] [3ds] Gun
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

cooper:

Looks pretty good, but going off of it’s a little bit too smooth looking, particularly the bottom of the grip. Also, the trigger appears to be a little bit different on your model.

Theres different versions of the baretta. And as some people model, they will get the general shape of an object and then start adding the detail and what not.

Read full topic
